name: MEC Compass Sunglasses - Unisex
description: A low profile, frameless design that allows you to glance down or keep your eyes glued down the road without anything blocking your view.Frame fits smaller heads.Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses.Rubber temple tips and adjustable rubber nose pads offer a customizable, comfortable fit, that doesn’t shift around.Interchangeable lenses allow you to customize your lens to your current conditions (additional lenses are sold separately).8-base curvature hugs the contour of your head, protecting you from all angles.Photochromic lenses adjust from 40% to 16% visible light transmission.Clear lens has 93% visible light transmission.Grey lens with blue mirror has 15% visible light transmission.Grey lens with silver flash has 11% visible light transmission.

Lens performance\n\nFixed tints provide: Fixed tint (Matte Metallic Navy/Grey w/Blue Revo)
